before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"cud1u","text":"Modify the ssOligo overhangs and Sanger sequencing primer according to the plasmid that you are using.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7cpd7","text":"In this lab protocol, we will outline a step-by-step procedure for cloning of spCas9 sgRNAs using oligo annealing and T4 ligation. This protocol will guide you through the crucial steps of designing, annealing, ligating oligonucleotides and digested plasmids, as well as heat shock transformation procedure to clone sgRNAs expression vectors.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

documents.ofn: sgLenti vector for CRISPR sgRNA expression.gbk

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Oligo Design
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"apk6q","text":"Order TOP and BOTTOM strand oligos, where the TOP sequence is the desired 20 nt sgRNA 'spacer' sequence and the BOTTOM sequence is the reverse complement of the TOP strand. After annealing of both oligos, the 5' overhangs should result in compatible sticky ends for T4 ligation into the target vector. Shown are example sticky ends to clone into the vector sgLenti (Addgene #105996). Alternative sgRNA expression vectors may require different sticky ends.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7dhct","text":"","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e42l9","text":"5’-TTGGNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN -3’","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":3,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"erccv","text":"                    3’-NNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNCAAA-5’","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":42,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"929d","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bce7h","text":"TOP strand oligo: 5'-TTGGNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN-3'","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":21,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3i6ri","text":"BOTTOM strand oligo: 5'-AAACNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN-3'","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cppoe","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
